output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: - No CMF number is visible in the post, but this isn't determinative
2. References to Candidate: - Directly mentions "George Simion PREŞEDINTE" in the link title - George Simion is one of the presidential candidates (Position 2)
3. Addresses Wide Population: - The post is a paid advertisement reaching 25,000-29,999 impressions - Uses broad language addressing "Românii" (all Romanians) - Published on Facebook and Instagram - Estimated audience size of 100,001-500,000 people
4. Electoral Objective: - Clear electoral objective with "De ce e nevoie de George Simion PREŞEDINTE?" - Calls for political change through elections - Explicitly promotes a presidential candidacy - Uses persuasive language to influence voting behavior
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This is not journalistic content - It's clearly campaign material promoting a candidate - Uses emotional appeals and campaign rhetoric
6. Personal Opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but an official party communication (AUR local branch) - Structured as campaign messaging

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Paid advertisement with significant reach - Contains campaign messaging - Published by an official party channel - Aims to influence voting behavior - Occurs during the restricted period after campaign end
conclusion.message-for-police: Pagina de Facebook "AUR - Sălașu de Sus" (ID: 296678066869537), pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea campaniei, promovând candidatul George Nicolae Simion la funcția de președinte prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 2006851919778923). Reclama, care a generat între 25.000 și 29.999 de afișări, promovează explicit candidatura la președinție și îndeamnă alegătorii să voteze pentru schimbare, continuând să fie difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel perioada de restricție electorală.
